coreAttributes.name: ankh necklace
coreAttributes.description: A necklace consisting of a thin chain with an ankh pendant threaded onto it. The ankh itself is an upright cross, which has a loop instead of the top arm. As an alternative to being worn around the neck, it would be possible to wrap the chain around your wrist.

replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] firmly [npc.verb(grab)] [npc2.name], before fastening the ankh necklace around [npc2.her] neck.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc.her] ankh necklace, before taking it off from around [npc.her] neck.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] ankh necklace, before taking it off from around [npc2.her] neck.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] ankh necklace, before yanking it off from around [npc2.her] neck.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] [npc.her] ankh necklace around [npc.her] wrist and then [npc.verb(fasten)] it in place.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] the ankh necklace around [npc2.namePos] wrist and then [npc.verb(fasten)] it in place.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(wrap)] the ankh necklace around [npc2.namePos] wrist and then tightly [npc.verb(fasten)] it in place.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc.her] ankh necklace, before unwrapping it from around [npc.her] wrist.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] ankh necklace, before unwrapping it from around [npc2.her] wrist.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] ankh necklace, before snatching it off [npc2.her] wrist.
